6/26/2024.name: Summer Art Fest (Session 1)
6/26/2024.description: All students from a summer art class (Art & Design, Digital Art & Design, & Photography) will be exhibiting artwork from that class to celebrate their hard work. The art fest will feature a variety of art mediums such as wire sculptures, clay vessels, photographs, digital paintings, etc.

7/30/2024.name: Stevenson High School Band Fundraiser - Chipotle
7/30/2024.description:
Come support the Stevenson High School Band at the Lincolnshire Chipotle on Tuesday, July 30 from 4 - 8 p.m.! 25% of sales will go to support our program.



Make sure to use the code  GEJCKZL  with your order to help support the fundraiser!

8/9/2024.name: Freshmen Orientation Day 2024
8/9/2024.description:
The  Freshman Mentor Program (FMP)  is a comprehensive advisory program that spans the length of freshman year and focuses on helping students create and maintain connections to campus, classmates and our community. The FMP upperclassman mentors are "trusted guides" who help students become familiar with Stevenson's physical layout, policies, programs, traditions and personnel, while simultaneously developing powerful relationships with each freshman. Each freshman will spend the day with their FMP mentors on Freshman Orientation Day, the first day of a year-long journey to help each freshman find success at Stevenson!

For more information, visit the  Incoming Freshman: Class of 2028 web page .

8/21/2024.name: Open House - Night 1
8/21/2024.description:
Open House is scheduled for two nights, one of which parents should attend based on their last name. If you have a calendar conflict with the designated Open House evening, please feel free to attend on the other date. There is no need to inform us of the change. We encourage all parents to attend one of the two nights:
 * Before both Open House evenings start, freshman and transfer student families are invited to meet with their child's counselor from 6:15 p.m. - 6:45 p.m.
* Wednesday, August 21, from 7:00 - 9:30 pm: Last Names A - L
* Thursday, August 29, from 7:00 - 9:30 pm: Last Names M - Z
 
For more information, please read the communications for  Freshmen/Transfer Students  and  Sophomores/Juniors/Seniors .

8/29/2024.name: Activity Period (Senior Core Curriculum)
8/29/2024.description:
Seniors 
This is a mandatory meeting with your counselor during the activity period. You must attend this meeting even if you have a club.
  

 DOWNLOAD :  Counselor Room Locations 


 Clubs  *  TBA 
  All Other Students  * Remain in  your   second-period class  for the Activity Period.

9/27/2024.name: Homecoming Game: Varsity Patriots Football vs. TBA
9/27/2024.description:
Admittance to the Patriots Varsity Football game will require the following: 
 * A purchased ticket, GoFan Booster, or Activity Pass is Required for entry.
* Stevenson students are required to have their   current student ID   with them for entry to the football game.
* Tickets should be   purchased in advance   via GoFan  https://gofan.co/app/school/IL15688 
* If you have EVENT printed on your ID please proceed to the line identified for passholders.
* As a friendly reminder, there is no re-entry for students.

10/17/2024.name: Yearbook Photo Re-Take Day
10/17/2024.description:
View your School Portraits, and select your yearbook/class picture before Retake Day!
 * *The final deadline is two weeks after retake day; if you do not pick an image VIP will choose a yearbook image for you*
* To view your student's school portraits look for an email sent to you by "Visual Image Photography", or go to  vipis.com 
* Retake pictures will be taken on  Thur   10/17/24 & Fri 10/18/24 (10 a.m. - 3:30 p.m. - location TBA) . This is for students who have not yet taken a Yearbook Portrait this year, or for students who have reported a need for a new picture
* Retake photos will be added to your online image gallery about a week after photo day
* If you have any questions, please email  support@vipis.com 
 
Seniors who took a photo on School Picture Day AND paid for a "VIP Premier Senior Portrait Session" -- the image you choose from your Premier Session gallery will be your yearbook selection. If you'd rather use an image taken during the fall School Picture Day instead, please contact  support@vipis.com
